articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.title: Volvo will use Epic's Unreal Engine to create "photorealistic" graphics in its electric cars - The Verge
articles.description: Volvo is teaming up with Epic Games to use the Fortnite creator’s powerful Unreal Engine to design the human-machine interface in the automaker’s upcoming lineup of EVs.
articles.content:
A new partnership to enable better, less distracting HMI
Volvo will be the latest automaker to tap into the graphical prowess of Epic Games Unreal Engine. The Swedish automaker said it will partner … [+5058 chars]

articles.title: Destiny 2 Hotfix 4.1.0.1 > News - Bungie
articles.description: Bungie.net is the Internet home for Bungie, the developer of Destiny, Halo, Myth, Oni, and Marathon, and the only place with official Bungie info straight from the developers.
